banner-text-hello: Hello, my name is Yerassyl. Currently, I work as a Full-Stack developer, but my true passion lies in becoming a lead Frontend developer.
banner-text-passion: My passion for programming emerged during my school years when I actively participated in regional informatics olympiads, achieving top positions. After graduating with honors from one of the country's top universities, I deepened my knowledge and skills by taking part in an international hackathon.
banner-text-knowledge: My constant desire to learn and strive for self-improvement drives me to actively study modern technologies, particularly Frontend, through courses on platforms like YouTube and Udemy. Specifically, I immerse myself in learning React and actively apply it in my work.
banner-text-plans: Realizing the importance of a well-rounded education, I also plan to expand my knowledge in other popular frameworks such as Vue and Angular.
banner-text-end: My dedication to quality development, practical experience, and diligence in learning make me a suitable candidate for the role of a lead Frontend developer. I am always ready for new challenges and eager to contribute to the growth of a respected company. Thank you for your attention.
